miniGames.memory

Class Memory

  • java.lang.Object
    • miniGames.memory.Memory

  • public class Memory
extends Object
    Memory game.
    Author:
    Marcin Szymkowiak

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ArrayList<MemoryCard> cards
      ArrayList containing all cards available.
      private byte cardsleft
      Amount of cards left on board. 20 on start.
      private Component[] components
      Array with JLabels on which cards are displayed.
      private MemoryCard[] drawnCards
      Array with 20 drawn cards.
      private byte flipped
      Number of flipped (their front side is visible) cards on board.
      private String folder
      Folder in which cards images are stored.
      private MemoryFrame memoryframe
      MemoryFrame on which game is shown.
      private short movesmade
      How many moves have been already made.
      private Thread refresher
      Thread that flips cards on back side when 2 are shown or hides them if they match with each other.

      Memory()
      Constructor for Memory.

      Loads cards from folder in alphabetical order.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Memory

        public Memory()
        Constructor for Memory. Sets standard folder.

    • Method Detail

      • drawCards

        private MemoryCard[] drawCards()
        Draws 20 cards.
        Returns:
        Array with 20 memory cards.

      • endGame

        private void endGame()
        Enbales the EndButton.

      • loadCards

        private void loadCards()
        Loads cards from folder in alphabetical order. It's important to have card with it's answer right next to each other. Back side should be stored in back.jpg image.

      • startGame

        protected void startGame()
        Starts game. Sets all drawnCards in JLabels, starts new Thread that hides two cards if guessed correctly or flips them back otherwise.

      • getComponents

        public Component[] getComponents()
        Returns array with JLabels.
        Returns:
        Array with components.

      • getDrawnCards

        public MemoryCard[] getDrawnCards()
        Returns array with drawn cards.
        Returns:
        array with MemoryCard instances.

      • getFlipped

        public byte getFlipped()
        Returns:
        Byte number storing number of flipped cards.

      • getMemoryframe

        public MemoryFrame getMemoryframe()
        Returns MemoryFrame.
        Returns:
        MemoryFrame instance.

      • getMovesmade

        public short getMovesmade()
        Returns:
        number of moves made by player.

      • hideCards

        public void hideCards(int i,
             int j)
        Hides two cards by setting their JLabels invisible and calls endGame() method if there are none cards left on board after that.
        Parameters:
        i - First card to be hidden.
        j - Second card to be hidden.

      • setFlipped

        public void setFlipped(byte flipped)
        Sets how many cards are flipped.
        Parameters:
        flipped - number to be set.
